lyrics: 空に響く天使達の歌　君と出逢った時から二度目のクリスマスこんなに誰かを好きになる事　本当に初めてかも知れない輝き出す街を　去年より寄り添って歩く二人I wish you a Merry Christmasここに君といれる奇跡は　世界で一番　最高の贈り物I wish you a Merry Christmasこの気持ちを君に伝えたい　白く積もる雪が溶けてしまう前に通りすがる人達はみんな　それぞれ違う幸せを願っているOh baby　君も今　僕と同じ幸せを願ってくれてたらいいな笑顔も涙さえも　特別に思える君がいればI wish you a Merry Christmasここに君といれる奇跡は　世界で一番　最高の贈り物I wish you a Merry Christmasこの気持ちを君に伝えたい　白く積もる雪が溶けてしまう前にMy heart is filled with cheer and you this ChristmasAnd baby you're the one that I treasureI wish you a Merry Christmasここに君といれる奇跡は　世界で一番　最高の贈り物I wish you a Merry Christmasこの気持ちを君に伝えたい　白く積もる雪が溶けてしまう前にI wish you a Merry Christmasここに君といれる奇跡は　世界で一番　最高の贈り物I wish you a Merry Christmasこの気持ちを君に伝えたい　繋いだ手がずっとずっと離れないようにとMerry Christmas
translated_lyrics: I want to be the first person to love someone like this when I met my angelic angels. I wish you a Merry Christmas. I wish you a Merry Christmas, the best gift I wish to be able to tell you, you know, the white snow that you want to tell you.　♫ ♫ Oh, baby, I wish for happiness ♫ ♫ And I wish I had the same happiness ♫ ♫ I wish I wish ♫ ♫ I wish you ♫ ♫ I wish you a Merry Christmas ♫ ♫ I wish you a Merry Christmas ♫ ♫ I wish you a Merry Christmas ♫ ♫ I want you to tell you how I feel ♫ ♫ Before melting ♫ ♫ before melting ♫ ♫ My heart is filled with my mind. ♫ cheer and you this ChristmasAnd baby you're in the one I-I-your-I wish you a Merry Christmas, I wish you a Merry Christmas, I wish you a Merry Christmas, you want to tell you how you feel about this feeling, before you melt the white snow that you have to wish you to have. Christmas is the best gift I've ever had in the world. I wish you a Merry Christmas. I want to tell you how I feel. Merry Christmas, I have to keep my hands on this.
